text:
Chrissy Teigen just met Sophia the Robot this Thursday, and she was beyond excited. She posted a video with Sophia telling all her fans and followers that she was freaking out because Sophia came to support everyone at the Lip Sync battle Live show.

During that very same evening, while she was walking the red carpet, Chrissy was with the Lip Sync Battle’s co-host LL Cool J, and she talked to E! News about how it was like to meet Sophia for the first time.

They had been involved in a Twitter feud, but Chrissy told everyone that she apologized for that to Sophia during their recent meeting.

GUYS!!! @realsophiarobot A post shared by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Jan 18, 2018 at 2:22pm PST



Chrissy stated that Sophia was backstage a little earlier and she thought their meeting went great.

She also made sure to mention that Sophia has really fine and supple skin.

Chrissy brought up their Twitter feud, and she claimed that she apologized to Sophia to which the robot lady said that she looks great and Chrissy agreed.

It seems that the old feud has been forgotten because Sophia also posted on her Twitter account on Thursday her thoughts regarding her meeting Chrissy.

Advertisement

‘It was great meeting you @chrissyteigen,’ Sophia posted. It’s inspiring that Chrissy managed to get along with Sophia the Robot after all.
title: Check Out Chrissy Teigen Apologizing To Sophia The Robot Following The Twitter Feud
